title: Gold Resumes Climb After Choppy Session Pauses Scorching Rally
description: Gold resumed gains, after its first drop in nearly two weeks, as geopolitical upheaval and a retreat from sovereign bonds and currencies powered a record-breaking rally.
content: Gold resumed gains, after its first drop in nearly two weeks, as geopolitical upheaval and a retreat from sovereign bonds and currencies powered a record-breaking rally.
